text: Jean-Jacques Candelier in 2013. Jean-Jacques Candelier (born March 7, 1945 in Bugnicourt, Nord) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Nord department, and is a member of the Gauche démocrate et républicaine. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nord (French department) Category:Politicians from Hauts- de-France Category:French Communist Party politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Jacques Candelier
